required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of a Cohort of Patients With Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome Treated With Orthopedic Surgery (SED-eval)
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of a Cohort of Patients With Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome Treated With Orthopedic Surgery (SED-eval)

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to assess the joint involvement (shoulder - ankle - knee - elbow - wrist) in patients with Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome and treated by surgery.

primary_outcome.measure: Joint function score according to the affected joint
primary_outcome.description: A joint function score according to the affected joint in patients with Ehlers-Danlos syndrome treated by surgery,: Shoulder (SSV; QuickDash),

primary_outcome.measure: Joint function score according to the affected joint
primary_outcome.description: A joint function score according to the affected joint in patients with Ehlers-Danlos syndrome treated by surgery,: Knee (Lysholm tenger),

primary_outcome.measure: Joint function score according to the affected joint
primary_outcome.description: A joint function score according to the affected joint in patients with Ehlers-Danlos syndrome treated by surgery,: Ankle (EFAS),

primary_outcome.measure: Joint function score according to the affected joint
primary_outcome.description: A joint function score according to the affected joint in patients with Ehlers-Danlos syndrome treated by surgery,: -Elbow and wrist (QuickDash) )

arm_group.arm_group_label: Elher-Danlos syndrome patients treated with orthopedic surgery

intervention.intervention_name: A joint functional score based on the affected joint
intervention.description: A joint function score according to the affected joint in patients with Ehlers-Danlos syndrome treated by surgery,: Shoulder (SSV; QuickDash), Knee (Lysholm tenger), Ankle (EFAS), Elbow and wrist (QuickDash) )
intervention.arm_group_label: Elher-Danlos syndrome patients treated with orthopedic surgery

study_pop.textblock: Patient over 18 years-old, suffering from Ehler-Danlos syndrome treated with surgery

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patient over 18 years-old suffering from Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome and belonging to the EDS cohort of Raymond Poincaré Hospital in Garches
- Patient with joint involvement of the shoulder treated by surgery
- Patient with ankle joint damage treated by surgery
- Patient with joint damage to the knee treated by surgery
- Patient with elbow joint damage treated by surgery
- Patient with joint involvement of the wrist treated by surgery
- Patient affiliated or beneficiary of a social security scheme
- Patient who has been informed of the research and does not object to the use of his data.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient objecting to the use of their data
